fragment: After being diagnosed with lung cancer, Walter White starts manufacturing methamphetamine to provide for his family.
Skyler White deduces that Walter is a drug dealer and resolves to divorce him.
Jesse Pinkman is a small-time methamphetamine user, manufacturer, and dealer who becomes Walter's business partner.
Hank Schrader is a DEA agent who becomes involved in investigating the meth trade.
Marie Schrader is Skylar's sister and Hank's wife, who struggles with kleptomania.
Saul Goodman is a sleazy lawyer who acts as Walter and Jesse's attorney and provides comic relief.
Gus Fring is a Chilean-born drug kingpin who uses his fried chicken restaurant as a front for his meth distribution.
Mike Ehrmantraut is a former police officer who works as a private investigator, head of security, cleaner, and hitman.
Lydia Rodarte-Quayle is an executive at Madrigal Electromotive and a partner in Gus's drug activities.
Todd Alquist is an exterminator and meth manufacturer who becomes Walter's assistant in the cooking process.
Kim Wexler is Jimmy's friend, romantic partner, and later wife, who becomes a successful lawyer.
Howard Hamlin is a name partner at a prestigious law firm and a source of frustration for Jimmy.
Nacho Varga is a calculating career criminal who becomes Hector Salamanca's right-hand man.
Chuck McGill is Jimmy's older brother and a named partner at a prestigious law firm.
Lalo Salamanca is Hector Salamanca's nephew who takes over the family's drug operation.
